scripts.verify: npm run check && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.db:migrate: sh -c 'if [ -f .env ]; then node --env-file .env --import tsx src/lib/server/db/migrate.ts; else node --import tsx src/lib/server/db/migrate.ts; fi'
scripts.db:seed: sh -c 'if [ -f .env ]; then node --env-file .env --import tsx src/lib/server/db/seed.ts; else node --import tsx src/lib/server/db/seed.ts; fi'
scripts.teams:build-package: sh -c 'if [ -f .env.teams-package ]; then node --env-file .env --env-file .env.teams-package --import tsx src/scripts/teams/build-app-package.ts; else node --env-file .env --import tsx src/scripts/teams/build-app-package.ts; fi'
scripts.teams:check: sh -c 'if [ -f .env.teams-package ]; then node --env-file .env --env-file .env.teams-package --import tsx src/scripts/teams/print-e2e-checklist.ts; else node --env-file .env --import tsx src/scripts/teams/print-e2e-checklist.ts; fi'
scripts.teams:zip-package: cd teams/appPackage && zip -r ../haveri-teams-app.zip manifest.json color.png outline.png
